scripts.//dev:
Start server. Server restarts on file change
    Normal environment
scripts.//dev:test:
Start server. Server restarts on file change
    Test environment
scripts.//lint: Run eslint on directory and subdirectories
scripts.//build:ui: Remove old build and create new build of frontend to server directory
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../client/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../server
scripts.//start:full:test:
Start server with new build of frontend
    Test environment
scripts.start:full:test: npm run build:ui && npm run start:test
